mapper.sql: ID, GUID, Name, Number, Status, Note, StatusDetail, ErrorCode, BankNumber
mapper.insert:
insert into bankshuttle
ID,
GUID,
Name,
Number,
Status,
Note,
StatusDetail,
ErrorCode,
BankNumber,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{statusdetail,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{errorcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{banknumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update bankshuttle
GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StatusDetail = #{statusdetail,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ErrorCode = #{errorcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BankNumber = #{banknumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bankshuttle set GUID = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StatusDetail = #{statusdetail,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ErrorCode = #{errorcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BankNumber = #{banknumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT b.ErrorCode as errorCode,e.ErrorRemark as errorMsg,b.bankNumber as bankId,b.name as name FROM bankshuttle AS B LEFT JOIN errorlist AS E ON E.ErrorCode=B.ErrorCode where b.ErrorCode <> '0' union SELECT b.ErrorCode as errorCode,e.ErrorRemark as errorMsg,b.bankNumber as bankId,b.name as name FROM bankhoists AS B LEFT JOIN errorlist AS E ON E.ErrorCode=B.ErrorCode where b.ErrorCode <> '0' union SELECT "107" as errorCode,"库不可用" as errorMsg, number as bankId, "立库故障" as name from bank where status <> '0' and OnOff='1' union SELECT "00" as errorCode,"暂存台不可用" as errorMsg, banknumber as bankId, "暂存台故障" as name from banktemporaryarea where status <> '0'
